message: Hello Bob, thank you for your interest in the product. I believe this is a valuable asset that can greatly benefit you. To start negotiations, I'm proposing a price of $1,600,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your proposal. I understand the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay up to $1,400,000. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I'm willing to negotiate, but $1,400,000 is still quite a bit below my initial asking price. To find a middle ground, I propose a price of $1,525,000.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I've reviewed our previous discussions and am willing to consider $1,500,000 as a potential price for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
